EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-11-01-Calgary Flames Email-Cisco.EM-2017-11-01-Email
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Calgary Flames Vs. Toronto Maple Leafs - 11/28/2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<https://turbonomic.com/learn-calgary-cisco/> DearÂ {{lead.First Name:default=Friend}},
We are pleased to invite to you an exclusive event on November 28th, for an evening of food, drinks and Flames Hockey!
Cisco and Turbonomic are happy to announce their partnership to enable elastic compute at cloud economics, their joint commitment to customer success and good times to our friends in Calgary.
I hope you will accept this invitation as token of appreciation for being a part of the Cisco family and a warm welcome as you consider becoming part of the Turbonomic family. We are excited to meet you and get to know you better. Calgary Executive Networking Event <[[https://turbonomic.com/learn-calgary-cisco/]]> Scotiabank Saddledome: 555 Saddledome Rise SE, Calgary, AB T2G 2W1, Canada Tuesday, November 28th, 7:00pm
We look forward to seeing you there!
Best,
The Turbonomic Team
